welcomePage.DiscriptionOne: This project, created as part of training at the RS School, is dedicated to React. This school helps to learn different languages and frameworks.
welcomePage.DescriptionTwo:
For example, this React course helped to gain skills and knowledge:
- creating applications on React + typeScript work with class and functional components create a common store for all data and much more.
welcomePage.DescriptionThree: You don't have to watch the application of our team, which was made as part of the final task. This application will help to manage projects, as it allows you to review tasks and see at what stage this or that task is.‚Äù
welcomePage.descriptionSchool: RS School is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community since 2013. Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence. The mentors and trainers of their school are front-end and javascript developers from different companies and countries. We are very grateful to the course for the wonderful opportunity to try myself in a new field of activity; the school has been helping us to believe that We can do anything!
welcomePage.doEvgeny: Hi, my name is Zhenya and I'm a fullstack developer
welcomePage.doTatiana: Hi, my name is Tatiana and this my first experience in React
welcomePage.doElizaveta: Hi, my name is Lisa and this is my first React course

preview.message: Dear student! Unfortunately, we did not have time to combine our latest developments. Above on the page are our developments on the implementation of drag-and-drop (without reference to state), and below will be showed the work of board route with state and BE (without drag-and-drop). Thank you for understanding!
